mapper.insert: insert into membership_privilege (login_name, privilege, start_time, end_time,created_time) value(#{loginName}, #{privilege}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createdTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE `membership_privilege` SET login_name = #{loginName}, privilege = #{privilege}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, created_time = #{createdTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from membership_privilege where login_name = #{loginName} and privilege='SERVICE_FEE' and #{currentDate} between start_time and end_time;
select login_name from membership_privilege where datediff(now(), end_time) = 1 and privilege='SERVICE_FEE';
